benefits.title: We Come to You
benefits.description: No need for your team to travel. I bring professional studio-quality equipment directly to your office, saving everyone time and hassle.

benefits.title: Efficient & Fast
benefits.description: Minimal disruption to your workday. Each team member gets professional photos in just 10-15 minutes with my streamlined process.

benefits.title: Consistent Branding
benefits.description: Unified look across your entire team's headshots. Perfect for websites, LinkedIn, marketing materials, and company directories.

benefits.title: Employee Morale Boost
benefits.description: Professional headshots are a valuable employee perk that shows you invest in your team's professional development and personal brand.

benefits.title: Expert Guidance
benefits.description: I coach everyone through posing and expressions—even those who are camera-shy. Everyone looks confident and professional.

benefits.title: Quick Turnaround
benefits.description: Professionally retouched images delivered within 7-10 business days. All files optimized for print, web, and social media.
